sentences.sentence: MVRDV presents the design for the Pushed Slab office building at ZAC Gare de Rungis in the 13th arrondissement of Paris, France.
sentences.translation: MVRDV 建筑师事务所设计的“挤压厚板”节能办公大楼位于法国巴黎的第13行政区。

sentences.sentence: At the time when I first became commissary of police, my arrondissement was in that part of Paris which includes the Rue st.
sentences.translation: 我第一次当警察局专员时，负责管辖巴黎的圣安东尼大街那片地方。

sentences.sentence: Avenue Montaigne in Paris' 8th arrondissement has some of the exclusive haute-couture boutiques and perfumeries in the Frenchcapital.
sentences.translation: 位于巴黎第八区的蒙田大道汇聚了法国独一无二的高级定制时装店和香水店。
